# criblio_pack (Data Source)

Pack DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "criblio_pack" "my_pack" {
  group_id = "...my_group_id..."
}
```

- `group_id` (String) Group Id

- `items` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items))
